fields.summary: Ti.StyledLabel Module no longer working on Android 6

comments.body:
Hi,
Tested *Ti.StyledLabel Module 2.0.2*  on Android 6 with Titanium SDK 5.1.2.GA . Ti.StyledLabel is working fine for me. 
Find the attached screenshot . 
Environment:
{code}
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.11.2
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 4
  Memory                      = 8589934592
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 0.10.37
  npm Version                 = 1.4.28
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.5
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 5.1.2.GA
  SDK Path                    = /Users/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/5.1.2.GA
  Target Platform             = android
{code}

*Connected Android Devices*
Nexus 7
  SDK Version                 = 6.0.1 (android-23)
  ABIs                        = armeabi-v7a, armeabi,

Thanks
I was using the 2.0.1 version for some reason.  I can confirm the 2.0.2 version is indeed working.  Sorry for the confusion.
